trustfund:
TF038896-ETHIOPIA - SUPERVISION -
            EMERGENCY RECOVERY PROJECT - PROCUREMENT FOR M,TF038954-ETHIOPIA - SUPERVISION OF
            EMERGENCY RECOVERY PROJECT,TF040919-ETHIOPIA: EMERGENCY RECOVERY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Ethiopia Emergency
            Recovery Project were as follows: outcomes were
            satisfactory, the risk to development outcome was moderate,
            the Bank performance was satisfactory, and the Borrower
            performance was satisfactory. Some lessons learned included:
            cash grants to households expedite procurement;
            infrastructure projects take time; combined capacity of
            local contractors and force account units and comparative
            competition for road works was effective; advantage of
            international expertise to build a humanitarian mine action
            organization must be taken; government commitment was the
            key success factor; and emergency projects require more
            frequent field inspections than normal projects.
